Our Teams

Athletic Community Club is home to 3 competitive teams across multiple sports and divisions.

Cologne Kickers

Sport: Football | Division: Senior | Founded: 2020

Our flagship senior soccer team competing in the regional league.

Coach: Angelina Martinez (UEFA B)

Training Schedule

  • Tuesday Training: Tuesday at 19:00 - Main Field

  • Thursday Training: Thursday at 19:00 - Main Field

View Full Team Details →

Cologne Strikers

Sport: Soccer | Division: Youth | Founded: 2021

Developing young talent in a supportive environment.

Coach: Aylin Çelik (Youth Development)

Training Schedule

  • Saturday Training: Saturday at 10:00 - Youth Field

View Full Team Details →

Cologne Runners

Sport: Track & Field | Division: Mixed | Founded: 2022

Multi-event track and field team for all ages.

Coach: Maximilian Schuster (Track & Field Specialist)

Training Schedule

  • Track Training: Wednesday at 18:00 - Athletics Track

View Full Team Details →
